text: Āṇi yahūdī va khriścana tumacyāśī kadhīhī khūśa hōṇāra nāhīta, jōparyanta tumhī tyān̄cyā dharmācē anusaraṇa na karāla. (Tumhī) sāṅgā kī allāhacē mārgadarśanaca, mārgadarśana asatē āṇi jara tumhī, āpalyājavaḷa jñāna ghē'ūna pōhōcalyānantarahī tyān̄cyā icchā abhilāṣān̄cē anusaraṇa kēlē tara allāhacyā javaḷa tumacā nā kōṇī samarthaka asēla, nā kōṇī sahāyyaka
